profile.description: I have more than 1 year of experience, I work with the Scrum methodology, in work teams I actively participate in the development cycle of different applications and systems, both in the development of new functionalities, evolutionary maintenance and improvements.Likewise, I personally developed projects completely from the beginning. I consider myself very adaptable since I have been in several different projects.
